comment: Ex-deputy PM Nick Clegg is pictured with Facebook chief in Silicon Valley as he lands million lobbying job despite previously slamming firm's paltry tax bills. Proving all politicians have their price

                                    :op1 "Facebook"))
                        :ARG2 (c / chief)))
            :time (l / land-01

                  :ARG1 (j / job
                        :topic (l2 / lobby-01))
                  :concession (s / slam-02

                        :ARG1 (b / bill-01

                              :mod (p6 / paltry))

            :location (c2 / city

                        :op2 "Valley")))

            :ARG1 (p9 / price-01
